Need work done?

Need some work done on your ride?

Give us a bit to respond with a detailed estimate. We need time to do a through review to research and write your estimate.

1 Get a Quote

Tells us what's wrong with your car or work you want done. We'll shoot back a detailed estimate that includes diagnosis, parts, and labor.

2 Approve Repairs

Once you approve the estimate, we'll book an appoitment to drop off your car and our team will get to work.

3 Time is Money

Only pay for time our team is working on your car. We use strict time tracking to ensure you won't pay extra.

4 Hit the Road

Our certified team will fix your car and get you back on the road.

To ensure a prompt response, please enter your valid phone number and email

Please be patient: It can take a day or 2 for smaller jobs and a few days for more complex requests.

Need work done?

Services

Get your classic back on the road, get it serviced, or make it perform better!

Performance Upgrades

From simple bolt on upgrades to drivetrain swaps and everything in-between - if it makes your car go faster, stop better or perform at it’s peak we’ve got it handled.

click for more

Repair & Maintenance

Get your baby running again or keep it maintained for peak performance so you can hit up cars & coffee with confidence we can get you back on the road and keep you during rubber.

click for more

Body, Paint & Metalwork

We do complete high end paint, metal and bodywork starting with full disassembly through show-quality finish work. We specialize in proper metal repair and custom finishes.

click for more

Frame-off Restoration

Want your baby restored right? We sweat every detail to bring your car back to factory fresh no matter what year or make or model it is.

click for more

Restomod & Full Builds

From concept drawings to completion - we can put modern touches in any classic car giving you a whole package that looks amazing and is a one of a kind performance machine.

click for more

Car Audio and Alarms

Music and classic cars go hand in hand - we focus on clean sound and even cleaner installation using high end components as well as 2-way GPS enabled security.

click for more

Restyling

From custom graphics, lighting upgrades and wheel choices - our design team can help make a big impact with tasteful changes to your car or truck.

click for more

Detailing

As a high end paint shop - who better to help keep your investment looking great? We offer paint correction and protection using the latest ceramic coatings.

click for more

How We Work

Getting your car worked on is easier than ever - Here's how you do it

1 Get a Quote

Tells us what's wrong with your car or work you want done. We'll shoot back a detailed estimate that includes diagnosis, parts, and labor.

2 Approve Repairs

Once you approve the estimate, we'll book an appoitment to drop off your car and our team will get to work.

3 Time is Money

Only pay for time our team is working on your car. We use strict time tracking to ensure you won't pay extra.

4 Hit the Road

Our certified team will fix your car and get you back on the road.

click for more

Featured Projects

Every build is infused with our blood and sweat. Taming metal and tuning performace.

  • Complete ground-up rebuild

    ’69 Barracuda Formula S

    This is one fine MOPAR! After almost a year in the shop, getting every last inch of old ground, sanded, painted, buffed and polished out, this classic restoration project went up at Barrett Jackson/Las Vegas 2013.

  • Classic Period-correct restoration

    Original Performance Restored

    • Resprayed in original A4 silver
    • Original 340 engine
    • Original 4-speed transmission w/Hurst shifter
    • Original 8 ¾” Sure-Grip rear end
    • Every nut and bolt on this car was touched
    • Period-correct restoration using NOS parts wherever possible
    • High-quality aftermarket parts when needed

Listen to our Customers

Don't take our word for it... Our great customers share their stories

  • “They did a great job of replacing my carburetor on my 1971 Monte Carlo. Very professional and detailed invoice I would highly recommend if you want your classic worked on to come here. Turn around time was fast.”

    Lisa Northcutt

  • “I came in to tune up the engine and in inspection. Car was bogging and not running well. Geoffrey replaced the carb and got the timing on point and the car was running at its best, thanks to Driven Garage. Driven Garage its just the place to to go.”

    Juan Cruz

  • “71 Chevelle: Performed a complete re-wire of the whole car, new dash and digital gauges, new retro radio, and a bunch more. I can not say enough about this team. So glad I found them. They make me feel welcome every time I stop by.”

    Jonathan Richardson

  • “This is THE place to take your older/classic car. Geoff and his crew are great!! I have been back multiple times to upgrade my 1977 Chevy Truck. They do it all from electrical, bodywork and of course working on vintage motors. Top notch quality work.”

    Eddie Valdez

  • “My 93 year old father has proudly owned a 1978 Buick Electra Limited. The lack of qualified repair shops that could service an older carbureted car lead me to a shop recommendation from Buick forum “Driven Garage”. THE go to place for all your service, repair and restoration needs.”

    Reggie Davis

  • “Driven Garage is a life saver! My car started sputtering and I had to pull over. Driven Garage was one of the few auto shops open on a Saturday! They ran diagnostics, ordered parts, and got it fixed by Monday. I'm very grateful for their work and great customer service!”

    Camila Hurtado
